name: New York Times News (Rss feed Reader)
description: New York Times News (Rss feed Reader) chrome extensions, and news notifications
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com/ https://googlechromeextensions.googlecode.com; object-src 'self';connect-src http://www.nytimes.com http://feeds.nytimes.com http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com http://fort-greene.blogs.nytimes.com http://eastvillage.thelocal.nytimes.com http://dealbook.blogs.nytimes.com http://bits.blogs.nytimes.com http://therail.blogs.nytimes.com http://wheels.blogs.nytimes.com http://formulaone.blogs.nytimes.com http://topics.nytimes.com http://lens.blogs.nytimes.com http://topics.blogs.nytimes.com http://wordplay.blogs.nytimes.com http://thelede.blogs.nytimes.com  'self'
